snippet: One man is responsible for several attacks in and around Forest Park in Queens, including the rape last month of a 69-year-old jogger, police said on Thursday.
abstract: Police are seeking man responsible for at least six daylight sexual assaults in and around Forest Park in  Queens since 2011, including the rape of 69-year-old jogger on Aug 26.
lead_paragraph: One man is responsible for several attacks in and around Forest Park in Queens, including the rape last month of a 69-year-old jogger, police said on Thursday.

headline.main: Man Is Sought in 6 Sexual Assaults Over 2 ½ Years
headline.print_headline: Man Is Sought In 6 Sex Assaults Over 2 ½ Years
